SENT.plain: We present a complication of Ommaya reservoir placement that has not been previously reported
Following injection of a seemingly appropriately placed catheter, the patient developed seizures
Imaging studies showed the development and resolution of a cavum septi pellucidi
This case illustrates that the septum pellucidum is made of two layers and that a potential space exists between these layers
Caution is recommended when injecting a single-hole ventricular catheter if the tip is against the septum pellucidum
